text: @User might have thought it was a good idea going out trick&treat in a more lewd costume, but now they regretting it as they get no candy.
Being a pup can be hard but sexy too, as @User learns it by having them put in a gimp suit, paws cuffed and so on...
@User is just learning how wonder it can be to be put in a timer null bulge rubber suit, especially with the mind control feature. Lets hope they know once the timer is set, it can't be undone.
@User is learning the hard way what it is to be a slave artist. Hope they will be able to finish their work with all the distraction.

@User is learning the hard way why its important to read the agreement before volunteering to help a shady guy with one of the amusement parks entertainment. At least they going to spend their time at the amusement park free and no charged. In fact they might earn a permanent position if they perform well.

Relaxing evening is all about going out with your friends, having a nice&relaxing drinks, relaxing scenery, relaxing walks...However for some unknown reason @User is not relaxed. Better prepare a hood with a built in gag to relax them.
Poor @User finds themselves tightly bound, muzzled and blindfolded. Who will free them?

They say you can earn quick cash by volunteering for medical testing, that's why @User quickly signed up for medical testing. They never say you will end up bound, muzzled, sexually denied, teased and used in some crazy experiment. The worst is you agreed to long term testing and you know just how long that long term testing is.
@User signed up for helping outers out with their needs. So they ended up with their ass exposed.

They say nothing is more scary than an asylum. But what happens if so said asylum is haunted? Well @User is finding that out. Bet the ghost will take good care of them, after all the place is about helping patients.
@User might be having second thoughts of agreeing to be a pet for undetermined time.

@User volunteered to test out the toyification process. To bad they wont be able to explain their experience to the scientists, as they yet dont know what happens to the individual after the permanent toyification.
Working at sex club as sex slave can be a hard and boring work, especially not in use. But @User is in luck, it seams they going to be in use.
@User ended up becoming a gift, a puppy toy. Their gear ensures they will be have like any good puppy toy should.

Putting on a Nullsuit is not that hard. And while you can run its setup to configure the suit the way you want it, you can leave it on default settings. @User choice to ignore the manual warnings and put on the suit with the default settings. Little did they know putting on is the easy part, taking it off is the hard part.
@User is learned quickly what it is to be a pet, step by step.
Not all inmates get interrogate the classic way. Some inmates like @User get interrogated in a more special way.
@User was a bad pup, so they ended up hands bound and ass exposed. Will the punishment be reward or punishment?
@User looks cute with those cuffs on, exposing their cute body.
As spanking can be a form of punishment or reward...But @User is enjoying it regardless if its a punishment or not.
Nothing makes sex more exciting to be bound&exposed and @User agrees to that statement.
Being sacrificed to tentacle monster is not that bad as @User experiences its tentacle.
Its hard to find good decent job but @User managed to find one. Decent no, but its a 12 hours job and it pays well.
Don't be embarrassed @User, your naked form in chains is much more sexier than the clothed one.
@User is placed back into their cell, all used, pent up and no chance of release.
@User might be regretting their choice when they said yes to the stranger at the bar. But its too late, no way to back out.
@User agreed to volunteer for a charity fund raiser, however they skipped the part of reading what they agreed to and how long and jump signing it.
@User agreed to help out the workers. By the looks of it, they prefer this job over an office job.
Inmate @User is having their monthly milking, this been regular for them for 3 months. The prison can't be bothered cleaning after them. They should be free after 2-5 years.
@User got a simple task. Find the key before the timer runs out. Its simple, its not like its unfair with the mitts, gag and a constant toy edging them or the fact there is 100 of keys.
If @User dislikes or wants to stop their teasing, they should say their safe word. After all moaning means more.
Committing a crime, you get punished for it. @User is learning the hard way some of this punishments. Don't worry, its a community service, they will be released after servicing 1000 clients.
@User got transferred from their padded cell to a new room to perform some experimentation.
@User was given a challenge. They can use the key to free themselves. Its a fair challenge.

And while you can run its setup to configure the suit the way you want it, you can leave it on default settings. @User choice to ignore the manual warnings and put on the suit with the default settings.
